Function Documentation

template<typename Container >
void qDeleteAllLater ( const Container &  c  )  [inline]

Delete all the object of a list later

Parameters:
c Container where we must delete all object.
See also:
qDeleteAllLater(ForwardIterator begin, ForwardIterator end)
template<typename ForwardIterator >
void qDeleteAllLater ( ForwardIterator  begin,
ForwardIterator  end 
) [inline]

Template used to delete all the object of list with an iterator. Instead of using C++ delete, this method called the deleteLater method of the QObject class, if the object is a QObject. Objects are delete when application process messages.

Parameters:
begin First iterator to delete
end Last iterator to delete
See also:
qDeleteAllLater(const Container &c)
